review: Tums Chewy Bites (calcium carbonate):I tried the cooling sensation Tums Chewy Bites and my heartburn is worse than before taking them. DO NOT get the cooling sensation kind. It is awful.
Worst antacid ever, the crazy flavors actually feel like they add to the problem. You'd be better off chewing charcoal... waste of $
Tums Chewy Bites (calcium carbonate):they work fine and work almost instantly for me I take them
Tums Ultra 1000 (calcium carbonate):They are great for immediate relief
There are other things which have worked better for me.
